DOC.brief_summary: This national physician mail survey examine primary care practice pattern . The experimental component study ( clinical trial ) randomize trial different monetary incentive form amount physician invite participate study . Only non-VA physician include part study . ( VA physicians allow receive monetary incentive . ) Physicians randomize receive one four incentive : $ 20 cash , $ 50 cash , $ 50 check , $ 100 check . The main outcome measure response rate .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Practice Intensity : Comparing Veterans Affairs ( VA ) Private Sector Physicians
DOC.detailed_description: This primary care physician survey conduct Harris Interactive , international survey research firm work collaboratively contract VA investigator head study . Surveys mail random sample 1000 non-VA primary care general internist practice 20 clinical hour per week , identify via Physician Masterfile American Medical Association . The initial survey mailing , deliver via USPS Priority Mail , include cover letter invite physician participate , 12-page survey booklet ( include cover page , 9-page survey , 2 blank page ) , monetary incentive , prepaid address return envelope . The survey estimate take 20 minute complete . All survey recipient also opportunity , part survey , request information practice pattern community . Harris Interactive randomly assign invite ( non-VA ) physician receive one four incentive , include initial survey mailing : $ 20 cash $ 50 cash $ 50 check $ 100 check Non-responders contact two additional time ( approximately 2 4 week follow initial mail ) telephone mail . Subsequent mailing include survey , cover letter , stamp addressed return envelope , monetary incentive . Response rate compare four arm trial ; check v. cash ; different denomination .
DOC.criteria: Primary care general internist United States , identify AMA Physician Masterfile , practice least 20 hour per week eligible participate . All physician include sample survey packet mail included analysis incentive experiment , except survey packet return undeliverable nonrespondents identify followup procedure nonlocatable , deceased , retired . Physicians selfidentified AMA Masterfile medical subspecialists hospitalists exclude sample .
